__e: If I can get us a shot on the devil, we have to take it.
If I can buy some time for you and her... just one day... then maybe my life will be worth something.
I don't know how much time we can buy you.
Look, I know this sucks, but as long as it seems like we're cooperating, we're buying ourselves time.
My life can buy you time. That's one hell of a deal.
You'll have to be someone else, too. We'll stop on the way.
So put her to work, watch her.
You get me what I want, Mr. Soprano, and you have a deal.
If it works, I want you to give me a job in your hotel.
Well, well. I'm going to make up my own mind. And then we'll take it from there.
You said I should respect me, and I tried that.
I have a plan to buy us some time and get help.
